page.title: 02LIST OF TRADERS
page.content:
There are 8 shops in Ixworth and 13 businesses. All the shops are in the High street. Here is a list of them:-
1.Christopher's - Hairdressers 2.Flora- Flowers and greengrocer 3.Spar - Grocer and butcher 4.Pickerel - Public House 5.Kerensa - Wool shop 6.Theobolds -Restaurant 7.B.G.Webb- Radio T.V.& Video hire 8.James Alexander- Estate Agents and Insurance Broker. 9.Sturgeons- Haulage and Motor repairs 10.Fordhams petrol, car sales & repairs 11.Helyer- Gunsmith 12.Greyhound-Public House 13.Dairy Crest-Dairy & distribution depot. 14.Staines-Builder 15.Farrows-Post Office and Baker 16.Palastanga - Washing Machine repairs
